title: [信息]PlayerInformation —— 类似Hypixel空岛的右击获得玩家信息[1.8-1.15]
author: 南派董卓
txt_content:
本帖最后由 南派董卓 于 2020-3-9 11:33 编辑 


Player Information作者的话：
这个插件从Hypixel的空岛获取灵感，你可以用shift+右击一个玩家，将会向你展示玩家的盔甲、手持物品等。这个插件也是这个插件的改善版。因为没有插件既像这样又能自己配置，所以我决定免费制作这样的插件。








特点：
可配置的GUI（标题）可配置每个项目的物品重载配置命令自定义界面根据需要用命令创建多个项目shift+右击取得玩家信息可以禁止获取NPC的信息支持PlaceholderAPI(站内搬运)可以禁止让其他玩家获取你的信息（用命令）使用命令查看其它信息提示信息可自由修改

命令&权限：
/playerinfo - 获取帮助 - playerinformation.help/playerinfo reload - 重载配置文件 - playerinformation.reload/playerinfo view <玩家名> - 查看玩家信息 - playerinformation.view/playerinfo toggle - 切换启用/禁用玩家信息 - playerinformation.toggle

用法：
1.放入服务端plugins文件夹下，重启服务器，生成配置文件
2.在配置文件中修改声音名（1.8与1.9+的声音名不同，配置文件里有需要的链接），修改物品材质（特别是1.13+）。
3.保存配置文件，重启服务器（或使用/playerinfo reload指令）
如果还是不会，可以询问作者。（spigot或discord）

重要！1.13+必看
如果想要使用彩色玻璃，需要在配置文件中material改为彩色玻璃名，并将data设置为0，例如：
fill-inventory:
  enabled: true
  material: BLACK_STAINED_GLASS_PANE
  name: '&f'
  data: 0
  amount: 1复制代码
配置文件：
1.8-1.12配置文件

# Thank you for downloading this resources
# Don't forget to rate 5 stars :)
# Support: https://discord.gg/vHqQfsF
# Developed by: aglerr
############################################
messages:
no-permission: '&6&l(!) &cNo permission!'
reload: '&6&l(!) &aYou have reloaded the configuration.'
disable-world: '&6&l(!) &cYou can''t use this feature on this world.'
open: '&6&l(!) &aYou have opened &e%player_name%&a''s information.'
target-not-found: '&6&l(!) &cPlayer not found!'
help-cmd:
- '&6&l&nPlayerInformation - v1.7'
- '&6/pi view <player> &7- see any player''s information'
- '&6/pi reload &7- reload the configuration.'
- '&6/pi toggle &7- toggle on/off so other players can''t see your information.'
toggle-blocked:
- '&6&l(!) &7You have &cblocked &7player information'
- '&7Now everyone &ccan''t &7see your information'
toggle-enabled:
- '&6&l(!) &7You have &aenabled &7player information'
- '&7Now everyone &acan &7see your information'
target-toggle-blocked: '&6&l(!) &e%player_name% &7has player information &cblocked'

# You can put 'disable-worlds: []' to disable this features.
# case-sensitive
disable-worlds:
- anyworld
- disabledworld

# Interval in ticks
# 20 ticks = 1 second
# 100 ticks = 5 seconds
auto-refresh:
enabled: true
interval: 40

# Time in seconds
cooldown:
enabled: true
time: 3
messages:
on-cooldown: '&6&l(!) &7You &ccan''t &7open player information for &6%time% seconds&7.'

fill-inventory:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
name: '&f'
data: 15
amount: 1

# You will get error message when you have wrong Sounds Enum for your server.
# Make sure to use those sounds enum according to your server version.
# 1.8: http://docs.codelanx.com/Bukkit/1.8/org/bukkit/Sound.html
# Latest: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/Sound.html
sounds:
onOpen:
enabled: true
name: BLOCK_LAVA_POP
volume: 10.0
pitch: 1.0
onClose:
enabled: true
name: BLOCK_LAVA_POP
volume: 10.0
pitch: 1.0

GUI:
title: '%player_name%''s profile'
size: 54
close-button:
enabled: true
material: BARRIER
name: '&cClose'
slot: 49
lore: []
playerHead:
enabled: true
amount: 1
slot: 22
name: '&a%player_name%''s information'
lore:
- '&aKills: &f0'
- '&aDeaths: &f0'
- '&aBlock Break: &f0'
item-null:
mainHand:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 1
name: '&aMain Hand'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'
# Warning! Off Hand only works for 1.9+ versions
# If you are running a below 1.9 server version.
# Then you need to disable Off Hand (enabled: false)
# Otherwise the plugin will not working properly.
offHand:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 2
name: '&aOff Hand'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'
helmet:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 10
name: '&aHelmet'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'
chestplate:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 19
name: '&aChestplate'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'
leggings:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 28
name: '&aLeggings'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'
boots:
enabled: true
material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
data: 14
slot: 37
name: '&aBoots'
lore:
- '&cEmpty!'

# You can create unlimited items in here with PlaceholderAPI support
# And also you can disable commands or lore, example:
# 'commands: []' or 'lore: []'
items:
youCanCreateAnything:
material: BOOK
data: 0
slot: 31
amount: 1
name: '&aPlayer Balance'
lore:
- '&fBalance: &2&l[        DISCUZ_CODE_49        ]amp;a%vault_eco_balance_formatted%'
commands:
- '[CONSOLE] say args number 1'
- '[PLAYER] balance'
- '[CONSOLE] say args number 3'
tradeItem:
material: EMERALD
data: 0
slot: 32
amount: 1
name: '&aTrade with &e%player_name%'
lore:
- '&fClick to trade!'
commands:
- '[PLAYER] trade %player_name%'
- '[CLOSE]'
noCommandItems:
material: DIAMOND
data: 0
slot: 33
amount: 3
name: '&bThis is Diamond'
lore:
- '&fExample No Command.'
commands: []复制代码

# Don't forget to rate 5 stars :)
# Support: https://discord.gg/vHqQfsF

计划：
1.区域禁用
2.玩家拥有权限才能查看GUI中的某些内容
3.如果查看玩家离开过远关闭GUI
4.单击GUI上的按钮触发...

Bug:
1.你不能创建同样的组

杂项&下载：

授权证明




支持作者，请从原帖下载
当前最新|历史版本

Bug反馈，赞助作者，提供意见
请去原帖，如有不便，可在本贴发布，由楼主代发

replies.txt_content: 如果作者能汉化一下配置文件就更好啦

replies.author: 玄月月
replies.txt_content: 你这个用的是什么图床，等半天不显示

replies.author: Gu_Qin_
replies.txt_content:
emm其实站内已经有一款类似的原创插件了
不过还是支持一下吧，希望可以添加点击命令之类的
